text: Djibril Sidibé (born 23 March 1982) is a Malian former professional footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. ==Career== On 8 July 2010, Sidibé signed a two-year contract with Maccabi Tel Aviv after completing a successful five- day trial with the team.Djibril Sidibé file en Israël….au Maccabi Tel-Aviv ! On 27 June 2011, he was placed on the club's Transfer List. On 31 August 2011, he was officially released from his contract. Sidibé has represented Mali at international level earning 47 caps and scoring four goals.Les états d'âme de Djibril Sidibé ==Honours== * Israel State Cup: 2013 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1982 births Category:Malian footballers Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bamako Category:Centre Salif Keita players Category:AS Monaco FC players Category:SC Bastia players Category:LB Châteauroux players Category:CS Sedan Ardennes players Category:Maccabi Tel Aviv F.C. players Category:Hapoel Ramat Gan F.C. players Category:Hapoel Ashkelon F.C. players Category:Red Star F.C. players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:2002 African Cup of Nations players Category:2004 African Cup of Nations players Category:2008 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Malian expatriate footballers Category:Mali international footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Expatriate footballers in Monaco Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in Monaco Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in Israel Category:Association football midfielders
title: Djibril Sidibé (footballer, born 1982)
